phrases.zh: 任何人都可以加入这个俱乐部。

sentences.en: Anyone can learn English.
sentences.zh: 任何人都能学习英语。

sentences.en: Is there anyone here?
sentences.zh: 这里有人吗？

sentences.en: You can go anywhere you like.
sentences.zh: 你可以去任何你喜欢的地方。

sentences.en: Books can take you anywhere in the world.
sentences.zh: 书籍可以带你去往世界上的任何地方。

sentences.en: The sunset over the ocean is wonderful.
sentences.zh: 海上的日落很美妙。

sentences.en: She had a wonderful time at the amusement park.
sentences.zh: 她在游乐园度过了一段美妙的时光。

sentences.en: There are few apples left in the basket.
sentences.zh: 篮子里剩下的苹果不多了。

sentences.en: He has few friends at school.
sentences.zh: 他在学校几乎没有朋友。

sentences.en: Quite a few students attended the lecture yesterday.
sentences.zh: 昨天有相当多的学生参加了讲座。

sentences.en: She has made quite a few friends since moving here.
sentences.zh: 自从搬到这里以来，她交了相当多的朋友。

sentences.en: Most students like playing games.
sentences.zh: 大多数学生喜欢玩游戏。

sentences.en: Most apples are red.
sentences.zh: 大多数苹果是红色的。

sentences.en: I need to say something to my friend.
sentences.zh: 我需要对我的朋友说些什么。

sentences.en: Can you tell me something interesting?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我一些有趣的事情吗？

zh: 没有什么；没有一件东西

sentences.en: I have nothing to say about it.
sentences.zh: 我对这件事没什么可说的。

sentences.en: You can't expect to get something for nothing.
sentences.zh: 你不能指望不劳而获。

phrases.en: I have nothing to do today.

sentences.en: Everyone is here today.
sentences.zh: 今天所有人都在这里。

sentences.en: Everyone likes playing games.
sentences.zh: 每个人都喜欢玩游戏。

sentences.en: Of course, I will help you with your homework.
sentences.zh: 当然，我会帮你做家庭作业。

sentences.en: Can you come to the party? Of course, I can.
sentences.zh: 你能来参加派对吗？当然可以。

sentences.en: I need to take care of myself.
sentences.zh: 我需要照顾我自己。

sentences.en: Myself is a reflexive pronoun.
sentences.zh: Myself 是一个反身代词。

sentences.en: Be yourself and never pretend to be someone else.
sentences.zh: 做你自己，永远不要假装成别人。

sentences.en: You should always believe in yourself and your abilities.
sentences.zh: 你应该永远相信自己和自己的能力。

sentences.en: The hen lays an egg every morning.
sentences.zh: 这只母鸡每天早上都下一个蛋。

sentences.en: A little girl is feeding the hen with corn.
sentences.zh: 一个小女孩正在用玉米喂母鸡。

sentences.en: A pig likes to eat corn.
sentences.zh: 猪喜欢吃玉米。

sentences.en: The pig is pink and fat.
sentences.zh: 这只猪是粉红色的，而且很胖。

sentences.en: The clouds seem to form a big animal.
sentences.zh: 云朵好像形成了一只大动物。

sentences.en: She seems happy with her new gift.
sentences.zh: 她似乎对她的新礼物很满意。

sentences.en: She feels bored on rainy afternoons.
sentences.zh: 下雨天的下午她感到无聊。

sentences.en: Playing the same game made him bored quickly.
sentences.zh: 玩同一个游戏让他很快感到厌烦。

sentences.en: Someone is knocking at the door.
sentences.zh: 有人在敲门。

sentences.en: I saw someone walking in the park.
sentences.zh: 我看见有人在公园里散步。

sentences.en: I keep a diary every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天写日记。

sentences.en: Her diary is full of interesting stories.
sentences.zh: 她的日记里满是有趣的故事。

sentences.en: We had an enjoyable time at the park.
sentences.zh: 我们在公园度过了愉快的时光。

sentences.en: Reading is an enjoyable hobby for many people.
sentences.zh: 阅读对很多人来说是一项令人愉快的爱好。

sentences.en: We will have a school activity tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们明天将有一个学校活动。

sentences.en: Playing sports is a healthy activity.
sentences.zh: 做运动是一项健康的活动。

sentences.en: I need to decide what to eat for dinner.
sentences.zh: 我需要决定晚餐吃什么。

sentences.en: She will decide which book to buy tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 她明天会决定买哪本书。

sentences.en: I will try my best to learn English.
sentences.zh: 我会尽我最大的努力学习英语。

sentences.en: You should try this new game; it's fun!
sentences.zh: 你应该试试这个新游戏，它很有趣！

sentences.en: Paragliding is an exciting sport where people fly using a parachute-like wing.
sentences.zh: 滑翔伞是一项令人兴奋的运动，人们使用类似降落伞的翼进行飞行。

sentences.en: She enjoys paragliding in the mountains during her free time.
sentences.zh: 她在空闲时间喜欢在山里进行滑翔伞运动。

sentences.en: I feel like eating ice cream today.
sentences.zh: 我今天想吃冰淇淋。

sentences.en: She feels like taking a walk in the park.
sentences.zh: 她想去公园散步。

sentences.en: A bird can fly in the sky.
sentences.zh: 鸟能在天空中飞。

sentences.en: I see a colorful bird in the tree.
sentences.zh: 我看见树上有一只彩色的鸟。

sentences.en: I ride my bicycle to school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天骑自行车去上学。

sentences.en: She bought a new bicycle for her birthday.
sentences.zh: 她生日时买了一辆新自行车。

sentences.en: We visited a tall building yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天参观了一座高楼。

sentences.en: The building has many windows and doors.
sentences.zh: 这座建筑物有许多窗户和门。

sentences.en: A trader buys and sells goods to make a profit.
sentences.zh: 商人通过买卖商品来获利。

sentences.en: The trader traveled to different countries to find new products.
sentences.zh: 这位商人去了不同的国家寻找新产品。

sentences.en: I wonder what the stars are made of.
sentences.zh: 我想知道星星是由什么构成的。

sentences.en: She looks at the magic show with wonder.
sentences.zh: 她惊奇地看着魔术表演。

sentences.en: Can you tell me the difference between a cat and a dog?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我猫和狗之间的区别吗？

sentences.en: The main difference between day and night is the presence of the sun.
sentences.zh: 白天和黑夜的主要区别在于太阳是否存在。

sentences.en: The sun rises at the top of the mountain.
sentences.zh: 太阳从山顶升起。

sentences.en: Please write your name at the top of the paper.
sentences.zh: 请把你的名字写在纸的顶端。

sentences.en: Please wait a minute.
sentences.zh: 请等一分钟。

sentences.en: I will wait for you here.
sentences.zh: 我会在这里等你。

sentences.en: I need an umbrella on rainy days.
sentences.zh: 下雨天我需要一把伞。

sentences.en: She opened her umbrella to keep dry.
sentences.zh: 她撑开伞以保持干爽。

sentences.en: The ground is wet after the rain.
sentences.zh: 雨后地面是湿的。

sentences.en: Her clothes got wet in the heavy rain.
sentences.zh: 她的衣服在大雨中淋湿了。

sentences.en: She was late because of the heavy rain.
sentences.zh: 她因为大雨迟到了。

sentences.en: We canceled the picnic because of the bad weather.
sentences.zh: 我们因为天气不好取消了野餐。

sentences.en: The word 'below' means in a lower position.
sentences.zh: 单词'below'的意思是在较低的位置。

sentences.en: Please write your name below the line.
sentences.zh: 请把你的名字写在横线下边。

zh: 足够的（地）；充足的（地）；充分的（地）

sentences.en: I have enough money to buy a book.
sentences.zh: 我有足够的钱买一本书。

sentences.en: Is this cake enough for everyone?
sentences.zh: 这个蛋糕够每个人吃吗？

sentences.en: When you feel hungry, you might want to eat a sandwich.
sentences.zh: 当你感到饥饿时，你可能想吃一个三明治。

sentences.en: A hungry cat is looking for food in the kitchen.
sentences.zh: 一只饥饿的猫正在厨房里找食物。

sentences.en: I want to be a doctor as an adult.
sentences.zh: 我长大后想成为一名医生。

sentences.en: She sings as beautifully as a bird.
sentences.zh: 她唱歌像小鸟一样动听。

sentences.en: We climbed a green hill yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天爬了一座绿色的小山。

sentences.en: The sun sets behind the big hill.
sentences.zh: 太阳落在那座大山后面。

sentences.en: A duck can swim in the pond.
sentences.zh: 鸭子可以在池塘里游泳。

sentences.en: The little duck has yellow feathers.
sentences.zh: 这只小鸭子有黄色的羽毛。

zh: 不喜爱（的事物）；厌恶（的事物）

sentences.en: I dislike eating spicy food.
sentences.zh: 我不喜欢吃辛辣食物。

sentences.en: She said she dislikes getting up early.
sentences.zh: 她说她不喜欢早起。

sentences.en: I help my mom with housework every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天帮妈妈做家务。

sentences.en: Doing housework can make our home clean.
sentences.zh: 做家务能让我们的家变干净。

sentences.en: She hardly eats meat.
sentences.zh: 她几乎不吃肉。

sentences.en: It hardly rained last month.
sentences.zh: 上个月几乎没下雨。

sentences.en: I will love you forever.
sentences.zh: 我会永远爱你。

sentences.en: Have you ever been to Beijing?
sentences.zh: 你曾经去过北京吗？

sentences.en: She hardly ever eats fast food because she prefers home-cooked meals.
sentences.zh: 她几乎从不吃快餐，因为她更喜欢家常菜。

sentences.en: My father hardly ever watches TV; he usually reads books in the evening.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸几乎从不看电视，他晚上通常看书。

sentences.en: I go to the park once a week.
sentences.zh: 我每周去一次公园。

sentences.en: She read this book once yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天读过这本书一次。

sentences.en: I brush my teeth twice a day.
sentences.zh: 我每天刷两次牙。

sentences.en: She read the book twice last week.
sentences.zh: 她上周把这本书读了两遍。

sentences.en: I use the Internet to search for information.
sentences.zh: 我使用互联网搜索信息。

sentences.en: The Internet connects people all over the world.
sentences.zh: 互联网连接着世界各地的人们。

sentences.en: We are learning a new computer program.
sentences.zh: 我们正在学习一个新的电脑程序。

sentences.en: The teacher showed us how to run the program.
sentences.zh: 老师向我们展示了如何运行这个程序。

sentences.en: The word 'full' means containing or holding as much as possible.
sentences.zh: 单词'full'的意思是装满的或包含尽可能多的东西。

sentences.en: When a glass is full, there's no space for more water.
sentences.zh: 当杯子满了（full），就没有空间再装更多水了。

sentences.en: The children like to swing on the playground.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在操场上荡秋千。

sentences.en: Can you swing the ball into the basket?
sentences.zh: 你能把球投进篮筐吗？

sentences.en: Swing dance is a lively partner dance that originated in the 1920s.
sentences.zh: 摇摆舞是一种起源于20世纪20年代的活泼的双人舞蹈。

sentences.en: People often dance swing dance to upbeat jazz music.
sentences.zh: 人们经常随着欢快的爵士乐跳摇摆舞。

sentences.en: Maybe we can go to the park tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 也许我们明天可以去公园。

sentences.en: She said maybe she will join us for dinner.
sentences.zh: 她说也许她会和我们一起吃晚饭。

sentences.en: He did the least work among all students.
sentences.zh: 他在所有学生中做的工作最少。

sentences.en: This is the least interesting book I have ever read.
sentences.zh: 这是我读过的最无趣的书。

sentences.en: You need to study for at least two hours every day.
sentences.zh: 你每天至少需要学习两个小时。

sentences.en: There are at least five books on the desk.
sentences.zh: 桌子上至少有五本书。

zh: 无用的东西；无价值的东西

sentences.en: Junk food is not good for our health.
sentences.zh: 垃圾食品对我们的健康不好。

sentences.en: We should throw junk into the dustbin.
sentences.zh: 我们应该把垃圾扔进垃圾桶。

sentences.en: Eating too much junk food is bad for your health.
sentences.zh: 吃太多垃圾食品对你的健康有害。

sentences.en: Junk food like chips and soda is often high in sugar and fat.
sentences.zh: 像薯片和苏打水这样的垃圾食品通常富含糖和脂肪。

sentences.en: I like to drink coffee in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在早上喝咖啡。

sentences.en: Coffee is a popular drink around the world.
sentences.zh: 咖啡是世界上受欢迎的饮品。

zh: 健康；人的身体（或精神）状态

sentences.en: Good health is important for everyone.
sentences.zh: 良好的健康对每个人都很重要。

sentences.en: We should exercise every day to keep health.
sentences.zh: 我们应该每天锻炼来保持健康。

sentences.en: The result of the experiment was surprising.
sentences.zh: 实验的结果令人惊讶。

sentences.en: She was happy with the final result of her hard work.
sentences.zh: 她对自己努力工作的最终结果感到满意。

sentences.en: The percentage of students who passed the exam is 80 percent.
sentences.zh: 通过考试的学生百分比是80%。

sentences.en: We need to calculate the percent of water in the solution.
sentences.zh: 我们需要计算溶液中水的百分比。

sentences.en: My friend is online now.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友现在在线。

sentences.en: I like to chat with online friends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢和在线的朋友聊天。

sentences.en: I watch news on television every evening.
sentences.zh: 我每天晚上在电视上看新闻。

sentences.en: The children are excited to watch cartoons on television.
sentences.zh: 孩子们很兴奋地在电视上看卡通片。

sentences.en: Although it rained heavily, we still went to the park.
sentences.zh: 尽管雨下得很大，我们还是去了公园。

sentences.en: She passed the exam although she didn't study hard.
sentences.zh: 她虽然没有努力学习，但还是通过了考试。

sentences.en: We walked through the park together.
sentences.zh: 我们一起穿过了公园。

sentences.en: She read through the entire book in one day.
sentences.zh: 她一天内通读了整本书。

sentences.en: A healthy mind is important for learning.
sentences.zh: 健康的头脑对学习很重要。

sentences.en: She used her mind to solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 她用自己的头脑解决了这个问题。

sentences.en: The body is the main part of a person's or animal's physical structure.
sentences.zh: 身体是一个人或动物物理结构的主要部分。

sentences.en: We use our body to move, feel, and interact with the world around us.
sentences.zh: 我们用身体来移动、感知和与周围世界互动。

sentences.en: I have never seen such a beautiful flower.
sentences.zh: 我从未见过如此美丽的花。

sentences.en: She is such a kind person that everyone likes her.
sentences.zh: 她是如此善良的人，以至于每个人都喜欢她。

sentences.en: There are many fruits, such as apples and bananas.
sentences.zh: 有很多水果，例如苹果和香蕉。

sentences.en: I like sports, such as swimming and running.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢运动，比如游泳和跑步。

sentences.en: We will go to the park together.
sentences.zh: 我们将一起去公园。

sentences.en: She and I often study together.
sentences.zh: 她和我经常一起学习。

sentences.en: Plants die without water and sunlight.
sentences.zh: 没有水和阳光，植物会死亡。

sentences.en: The old tree will die if we don't protect it.
sentences.zh: 如果我们不保护这棵老树，它将会死亡。

sentences.en: A writer creates stories and articles.
sentences.zh: 作家创作故事和文章。

sentences.en: My favorite writer won a literary prize.
sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的作家获得了文学奖。

sentences.en: I need to visit the dentist tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我明天需要去看牙医。

sentences.en: The dentist helps keep our teeth healthy.
sentences.zh: 牙医帮助保持我们的牙齿健康。

sentences.en: She reads a magazine every weekend.
sentences.zh: 她每个周末读一本杂志。

sentences.en: This magazine has many interesting stories.
sentences.zh: 这本杂志有很多有趣的故事。

sentences.en: I planned to go out, however, it started raining.
sentences.zh: 我原计划出门，然而天开始下雨了。

sentences.en: She studied hard, however, she didn't pass the exam.
sentences.zh: 她学习很努力，然而没有通过考试。

zh: （用以引出比较的第二部分）比

sentences.en: She is taller than her brother.
sentences.zh: 她比她哥哥高。

sentences.en: This book is more interesting than that one.
sentences.zh: 这本书比那本书更有趣。

sentences.en: She has more than five books.
sentences.zh: 她有超过五本书。

sentences.en: The movie lasted more than two hours.
sentences.zh: 这部电影持续了两个多小时。

sentences.en: She almost missed the bus this morning.
sentences.zh: 她今天早上差点错过了公交车。

sentences.en: The movie is almost over, so we should hurry.
sentences.zh: 电影快要结束了，所以我们应该快点。

phrases.en: None of the answers are correct.
She had none of the cookies.

sentences.en: none means not one thing or person.
sentences.zh: none 的意思是没有一个人或事物。

sentences.en: There are none left in the box.
sentences.zh: 盒子里一个都没有剩下了。

sentences.en: I need less sugar in my coffee.
sentences.zh: 我的咖啡里需要更少的糖。

sentences.en: There are less books on this shelf than before.
sentences.zh: 这个书架上的书比以前少了。

sentences.en: Three is less than five.
sentences.zh: 三小于五。

sentences.en: A cat is less than an elephant in size.
sentences.zh: 猫在体型上比大象小。

sentences.en: A point is a basic unit in geometry with no size.
sentences.zh: 点是几何学中没有大小的基本单位。

sentences.en: Please mark the starting point on the map.
sentences.zh: 请在地图上标记起点。

zh: 爱交际的；友好的；外向的

sentences.en: The outgoing mail needs to be posted today.
sentences.zh: 今天需要寄出的邮件要寄出去了。

sentences.en: She is known for her outgoing personality.
sentences.zh: 她以开朗外向的性格而闻名。

sentences.en: Both of my parents are teachers.
sentences.zh: 我的父母都是老师。

sentences.en: She likes both reading and writing.
sentences.zh: 她既喜欢读书也喜欢写作。

zh: （good和well的比较级）较好的（地）；更好的（地）

sentences.en: She is better at singing than dancing.
sentences.zh: 她唱歌比跳舞更好。

sentences.en: This book is better than the last one I read.
sentences.zh: 这本书比我上次读的那本更好。

sentences.en: He speaks loudly in the classroom.
sentences.zh: 他在教室里大声说话。

sentences.en: The children laughed loudly at the funny story.
sentences.zh: 孩子们因这个有趣的故事大声笑起来。

sentences.en: She quietly closed the door.
sentences.zh: 她轻轻地关上门。

sentences.en: The cat walked quietly through the room.
sentences.zh: 猫安静地走过房间。

sentences.en: A hard-working student always gets good grades.
sentences.zh: 一个勤奋的学生总是能取得好成绩。

sentences.en: She is known for being hard-working in her class.
sentences.zh: 她在班上以勤奋著称。

sentences.en: We will have a competition next week.
sentences.zh: 我们下周将有一场比赛。

sentences.en: She won first place in the singing competition.
sentences.zh: 她在歌唱比赛中获得了第一名。

sentences.en: The movie we watched was fantastic.
sentences.zh: 我们看的那部电影太棒了。

sentences.en: She did a fantastic job on her project.
sentences.zh: 她的项目完成得非常出色。

sentences.en: Which book do you want to read?
sentences.zh: 你想读哪本书？

sentences.en: Which color is your favorite?
sentences.zh: 你最喜欢哪种颜色？

sentences.en: Please speak clearly so everyone can understand you.
sentences.zh: 请说清楚，以便每个人都能理解你。

sentences.en: The instructions on the board are clearly written.
sentences.zh: 黑板上的说明写得很清楚。

sentences.en: I win the game.
sentences.zh: 我赢得了比赛。

sentences.en: She wants to win the prize.
sentences.zh: 她想赢得奖品。

zh: 不过；可是；然而；虽然；尽管；不过

sentences.en: She was tired, though she kept working.
sentences.zh: 她很累，尽管她还在继续工作。

sentences.en: Though it rained, we still went to the park.
sentences.zh: 尽管下雨了，我们还是去了公园。

sentences.en: She is a talented musician who plays the piano beautifully.
sentences.zh: 她是一位有才华的音乐家，钢琴弹得非常美妙。

sentences.en: The talented artist created a stunning painting in just one day.
sentences.zh: 这位有才华的艺术家仅用一天就创作了一幅令人惊叹的画作。

sentences.en: She truly believes in her dreams.
sentences.zh: 她真心相信自己的梦想。

sentences.en: This is truly a beautiful day.
sentences.zh: 今天真是美好的一天。

sentences.en: I care about my friends.
sentences.zh: 我关心我的朋友们。

sentences.en: She shows care for the little cat.
sentences.zh: 她对这只小猫表现出关爱。

sentences.en: We should care about our friends and family.
sentences.zh: 我们应该关心我们的朋友和家人。

sentences.en: It's important to care about the environment around us.
sentences.zh: 关心我们周围的环境是很重要的。

sentences.en: We laugh loudly at the funny story.
sentences.zh: 我们因这个有趣的故事大声笑起来。

sentences.en: She makes me laugh every day with her jokes.
sentences.zh: 她每天用她的笑话逗我笑。

sentences.en: He has a serious expression on his face.
sentences.zh: 他脸上带着严肃的表情。

sentences.en: We need to have a serious talk about this problem.
sentences.zh: 我们需要认真谈谈这个问题。

sentences.en: She looked at herself in the mirror.
sentences.zh: 她在镜子里看着自己。

sentences.en: The mirror reflects the light brightly.
sentences.zh: 镜子明亮地反射着光线。

sentences.en: The kid is playing in the park.
sentences.zh: 这个小孩正在公园里玩。

sentences.en: My little brother is a cute kid.
sentences.zh: 我的弟弟是个可爱的小孩。

sentences.en: You can go out to play as long as you finish your homework.
sentences.zh: 只要你完成作业，就可以出去玩。

sentences.en: As long as we work hard together, we will succeed.
sentences.zh: 只要我们一起努力，就会成功。

sentences.en: It is necessary to study hard every day.
sentences.zh: 每天努力学习是必要的。

sentences.en: Water is necessary for all living things.
sentences.zh: 水对所有生物都是必要的。

sentences.en: Cats are different from dogs in behavior.
sentences.zh: 猫和狗在行为上不同。

sentences.en: Her hobbies are different from mine.
sentences.zh: 她的爱好和我的不同。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to bring out our books.
sentences.zh: 老师让我们拿出我们的书。

sentences.en: She likes to bring out the best in her students.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢激发学生们最好的一面。

sentences.en: What grade are you in?
sentences.zh: 你在哪个年级？

sentences.en: She studies hard in grade five.
sentences.zh: 她在五年级学习很努力。

sentences.en: You should finish your homework on time.
sentences.zh: 你应该按时完成作业。

sentences.en: We should help each other.
sentences.zh: 我们应该互相帮助。

sentences.en: My book is the same as yours.
sentences.zh: 我的书和你的一样。

sentences.en: Her opinion is the same as mine.
sentences.zh: 她的观点和我的一样。

sentences.en: Saying kind words can make someone's day.
sentences.zh: 说善意的话能让某人开心一整天。

sentences.en: He is saying something important to his friend.
sentences.zh: 他正在对他的朋友说一些重要的事情。

sentences.en: Can you reach the book on the shelf?
sentences.zh: 你能够到书架上的那本书吗？

sentences.en: We need to reach the station before the train departs.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在火车出发前到达车站。

sentences.en: I use my hand to write.
sentences.zh: 我用我的手写字。

sentences.en: She has a red handbag in her hand.
sentences.zh: 她手里拿着一个红色的手提包。

sentences.en: Please touch the book gently.
sentences.zh: 请轻轻地触摸这本书。

sentences.en: I can touch the soft cat.
sentences.zh: 我可以触摸这只柔软的猫。

sentences.en: My heart beats fast when I run.
sentences.zh: 我跑步时心跳得很快。

sentences.en: The heart is an important organ in the body.
sentences.zh: 心脏是身体里一个重要的器官。

sentences.en: A fact is something that is known to be true.
sentences.zh: 事实是已知为真实的事物。

sentences.en: You can verify a fact with evidence or proof.
sentences.zh: 你可以用证据或证明来验证一个事实。

zh: 确切地说；事实上；实际上

sentences.en: She said she was busy, but in fact, she was just lazy.
sentences.zh: 她说她很忙，但事实上，她只是懒。

sentences.en: This problem seems easy, but in fact, it's quite difficult.
sentences.zh: 这个问题看起来简单，但事实上，它相当难。

syllables:
break

（注：根据Collins词典，"break"为单音节词，无需分割。原示例格式可能隐含“若为多音节词则用
分割”，此处单音节词直接输出原形。）

sentences.en: I need to take a break after studying.
sentences.zh: 学习后我需要休息一下。

sentences.en: Let's break for lunch at noon.
sentences.zh: 我们中午休息吃午饭吧。

sentences.en: He broke his arm while playing basketball.
sentences.zh: 他打篮球时摔断了胳膊。

sentences.en: She gently touched the baby's arm.
sentences.zh: 她轻轻抚摸着婴儿的胳膊。

sentences.en: Can you share your toys with me?
sentences.zh: 你能和我分享你的玩具吗？

sentences.en: We should share good things with friends.
sentences.zh: 我们应该和朋友分享好东西。

sentences.en: The music is too loud.
sentences.zh: 音乐太大声了。

sentences.en: Please don't be so loud.
sentences.zh: 请不要这么大声。

sentences.en: Cats and tigers look similar.
sentences.zh: 猫和老虎看起来很相似。

sentences.en: These two books have similar covers.
sentences.zh: 这两本书的封面很相似。

sentences.en: Apples are similar to pears in shape.
sentences.zh: 苹果和梨在形状上相似。

sentences.en: Her smile is similar to her mother's.
sentences.zh: 她的笑容和她妈妈的相似。

sentences.en: The primary color is red, blue, or yellow.
sentences.zh: 原色是红色、蓝色或黄色。

sentences.en: My primary goal is to finish homework today.
sentences.zh: 我的首要目标是今天完成作业。

sentences.en: I go to primary school every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天去小学上学。

sentences.en: Primary school is where I learn new things.
sentences.zh: 小学是我学习新东西的地方。

sentences.en: Information helps us learn new things.
sentences.zh: 信息帮助我们学习新事物。

sentences.en: We get information from books and the internet.
sentences.zh: 我们从书籍和互联网获取信息。

sentences.en: We are going to the theater to watch a movie.
sentences.zh: 我们要去剧院看电影。

sentences.en: The theater is a popular place for entertainment.
sentences.zh: 剧院是一个受欢迎的娱乐场所。

sentences.en: This sofa is very comfortable to sit on.
sentences.zh: 这个沙发坐上去很舒服。

sentences.en: She likes wearing comfortable clothes when traveling.
sentences.zh: 她旅行时喜欢穿舒适的衣服。

sentences.en: Please take your seat.
sentences.zh: 请坐好你的座位。

sentences.en: The seat is next to the window.
sentences.zh: 这个座位靠窗。

sentences.en: The computer has a big screen.
sentences.zh: 这台电脑有一个大屏幕。

sentences.en: I watch movies on the screen.
sentences.zh: 我在屏幕上看电影。

sentences.en: Please close the door.
sentences.zh: 请关上门。

sentences.en: The shop will close at 9 PM.
sentences.zh: 这家商店将在晚上9点关门。

sentences.en: I need a ticket to watch the movie.
sentences.zh: 我需要一张票去看电影。

sentences.en: She bought a train ticket online.
sentences.zh: 她在网上买了一张火车票。

zh: （bad和badly的最高级）最差（的）；最坏（的）；最糟（的）

sentences.en: This is the worst day I've ever had.
sentences.zh: 这是我经历过的最糟糕的一天。

sentences.en: The worst part of the movie was the ending.
sentences.zh: 这部电影最糟糕的部分是结局。

sentences.en: She bought the dress cheaply during the sale.
sentences.zh: 她在促销期间便宜地买到了这条裙子。

sentences.en: This toy is made cheaply, so it breaks easily.
sentences.zh: 这个玩具制作得很廉价，所以很容易坏。

sentences.en: I like listening to this song.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢听这首歌。

sentences.en: This song is very popular.
sentences.zh: 这首歌非常受欢迎。

zh: （电台、电视台、俱乐部的）音乐节目主持人

sentences.en: A DJ plays music at the party.
sentences.zh: DJ在派对上播放音乐。

sentences.en: The DJ uses turntables to mix songs.
sentences.zh: 这位DJ使用唱盘机混音歌曲。

sentences.en: You need to choose a book from the shelf.
sentences.zh: 你需要从书架上选一本书。

sentences.en: She will choose the red dress for the party.
sentences.zh: 她将为派对选择那条红色连衣裙。

sentences.en: She reads the book carefully.
sentences.zh: 她仔细地读这本书。

sentences.en: You should listen carefully in class.
sentences.zh: 你应该在课堂上认真听讲。

sentences.en: The reporter is interviewing the famous actor.
sentences.zh: 这位记者正在采访那位著名的演员。

sentences.en: She wants to be a reporter when she grows up.
sentences.zh: 她长大后想成为一名记者。

sentences.en: So far, we have learned 10 English songs.
sentences.zh: 到目前为止，我们已经学了10首英文歌。

sentences.en: He has finished three books so far this month.
sentences.zh: 这个月到目前为止，他已经看完了三本书。

sentences.en: I bought fresh vegetables from the market.
sentences.zh: 我从市场买了新鲜的蔬菜。

sentences.en: The air in the morning is very fresh.
sentences.zh: 早上的空气非常新鲜。

sentences.en: She sat comfortably on the soft sofa.
sentences.zh: 她舒适地坐在柔软的沙发上。

sentences.en: We can work comfortably in this quiet room.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在这个安静的房间里舒适地工作。

zh: （bad和badly的比较级）更差（的）；更坏（的）；更糟（的）

sentences.en: This book is worse than the one I read yesterday.
sentences.zh: 这本书比我昨天读的那本更差。

sentences.en: Her mood got worse after hearing the bad news.
sentences.zh: 听到坏消息后，她的心情变得更糟了。

sentences.en: The hotel offers good service to all guests.
sentences.zh: 这家酒店为所有客人提供优质服务。

sentences.en: We need to improve the customer service department.
sentences.zh: 我们需要改进客户服务部门。

sentences.en: She has a pretty smile.
sentences.zh: 她有一个漂亮的微笑。

sentences.en: The pretty flower is in the garden.
sentences.zh: 这朵漂亮的花在花园里。

sentences.en: The menu has many delicious dishes.
sentences.zh: 菜单上有很多美味的菜肴。

sentences.en: Can you show me the menu, please?
sentences.zh: 请给我看一下菜单好吗？

sentences.en: We need to act quickly.
sentences.zh: 我们需要迅速行动。

sentences.en: Her kind act made everyone happy.
sentences.zh: 她善良的举动让每个人都很开心。

zh: 早（或午、晚）餐；一餐所吃的食物

sentences.en: I eat three meals a day: breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
sentences.zh: 我一天吃三顿饭：早餐、午餐和晚餐。

sentences.en: My favorite meal is dinner because I can eat with my family.
sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的一餐是晚餐，因为我可以和家人一起吃。

sentences.en: She has a creative idea for the project.
sentences.zh: 她对这个项目有一个有创意的想法。

sentences.en: Painting is a creative activity that I enjoy.
sentences.zh: 绘画是我喜欢的一项有创意的活动。

sentences.en: The performer danced beautifully on the stage.
sentences.zh: 这位表演者在舞台上跳得很美。

sentences.en: She wants to be a famous performer in the future.
sentences.zh: 她未来想成为一名著名的表演者。

sentences.en: She has a talent for singing.
sentences.zh: 她有唱歌的天赋。

sentences.en: Hard work can develop your talent.
sentences.zh: 努力工作可以发展你的天赋。

zh: 有相同特征；（想法、兴趣等方面）相同

sentences.en: Apples and oranges have in common that they are both fruits.
sentences.zh: 苹果和橙子的共同点是它们都是水果。

sentences.en: What do cats and dogs have in common? They are both pets.
sentences.zh: 猫和狗有什么共同点？它们都是宠物。

sentences.en: The magician can perform amazing tricks.
sentences.zh: 这位魔术师能表演令人惊叹的魔术。

sentences.en: Children love watching the magician pull rabbits out of hats.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢看魔术师从帽子里变出兔子。

zh: 各种类型的；各种各样的

sentences.en: There are all kinds of books in the library.
sentences.zh: 图书馆里有各种各样的书。

sentences.en: She likes all kinds of fruits, especially apples.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢各种各样的水果，尤其是苹果。

sentences.en: The sunset painted the sky beautifully.
sentences.zh: 日落把天空画得很美。

sentences.en: She sings beautifully in the school concert.
sentences.zh: 她在学校音乐会上唱得很动听。

sentences.en: The success of the project is up to us.
sentences.zh: 这个项目的成败取决于我们。

sentences.en: How many people will come to the party is up to the weather.
sentences.zh: 有多少人来参加派对取决于天气。

sentences.en: My role is a student.
sentences.zh: 我的角色是一名学生。

sentences.en: He plays an important role in the team.
sentences.zh: 他在团队中扮演重要角色。

sentences.en: We need to play a role in the school play.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在校园剧中扮演一个角色。

sentences.en: Children often play a role when they pretend to be doctors or teachers.
sentences.zh: 孩子们假扮医生或老师时经常扮演一个角色。

sentences.en: The winner of the race received a gold medal.
sentences.zh: 这场比赛的获胜者获得了一枚金牌。

sentences.en: She worked hard and finally became the winner.
sentences.zh: 她努力拼搏，最终成为了获胜者。

sentences.en: She won first prize in the competition.
sentences.zh: 她在比赛中获得了一等奖。

sentences.en: The prize for the best story is a book.
sentences.zh: 最佳故事的奖品是一本书。

sentences.en: Everybody is here today.
sentences.zh: 今天所有人都在这里。

sentences.en: Everybody likes playing games.
sentences.zh: 每个人都喜欢玩游戏。

sentences.en: She likes to make up stories for her little brother.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢给她弟弟编故事。

sentences.en: Don't make up excuses for being late.
sentences.zh: 不要为迟到编造借口。

sentences.en: This is just an example sentence.
sentences.zh: 这只是一个例句。

sentences.en: Can you give me another example?
sentences.zh: 你能再给我一个例子吗？

sentences.en: You can use "for example" to introduce a sample, like "I like fruits, for example, apples and bananas."
sentences.zh: 你可以用“for example”来引出例子，比如“我喜欢水果，例如苹果和香蕉。”

sentences.en: "For example" helps explain ideas clearly; for example, when teaching colors, say "Bright colors, for example, red and yellow, are eye-catching."
sentences.zh: "for example”有助于清晰解释观点；例如，教颜色时可以说“鲜艳的颜色，比如红色和黄色，很引人注目。”

sentences.en: The poor family lives in a small house.
sentences.zh: 这个贫穷的家庭住在一个小房子里。

sentences.en: She often helps poor children with their studies.
sentences.zh: 她经常帮助贫穷的孩子学习。

sentences.en: He seriously considered the problem before answering.
sentences.zh: 他在回答前认真考虑了这个问题。

sentences.en: She told me seriously that I needed to study harder.
sentences.zh: 她严肃地告诉我需要更努力学习。

sentences.en: We should take seriously the teacher's advice.
sentences.zh: 我们应该认真对待老师的建议。

sentences.en: You must take seriously your responsibilities as a student.
sentences.zh: 你必须认真对待作为学生的责任。

sentences.en: She will give me a book.
sentences.zh: 她会给我一本书。

sentences.en: Please give this pen to Tom.
sentences.zh: 请把这支钢笔给汤姆。

sentences.en: The train station is always crowded during rush hour.
sentences.zh: 高峰时段火车站总是很拥挤。

sentences.en: We had to walk slowly through the crowded market.
sentences.zh: 我们不得不在拥挤的市场里慢慢走。

phrases.zh: 一部受欢迎的情景喜剧

sentences.en: My favorite TV show is a funny sitcom about a family.
sentences.zh: 我最喜欢的电视节目是一部关于一家人的有趣情景喜剧。

sentences.en: We often watch the sitcom together and laugh a lot.
sentences.zh: 我们经常一起看这部情景喜剧，并且笑得很开心。

sentences.en: I read the news every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上看新闻。

sentences.en: The news reports important events around the world.
sentences.zh: 新闻报道世界各地的重要事件。

sentences.en: My mother likes watching soap operas every evening.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈喜欢每天晚上看肥皂剧。

sentences.en: Soap operas often have many dramatic and emotional storylines.
sentences.zh: 肥皂剧通常有许多戏剧化且情感丰富的故事情节。

sentences.en: I need to use my mind to solve problems.
sentences.zh: 我需要用我的头脑来解决问题。

sentences.en: Reading books can make your mind grow.
sentences.zh: 读书可以让你的头脑成长。

sentences.en: Please stand up when the teacher enters.
sentences.zh: 老师进来时请站起来。

sentences.en: I can stand on one foot for a minute.
sentences.zh: 我能单脚站立一分钟。

sentences.en: Reading books is an educational activity.
sentences.zh: 读书是一项有教育意义的活动。

sentences.en: Our school offers many educational programs.
sentences.zh: 我们学校提供许多教育项目。

sentences.en: We need to make a study plan.
sentences.zh: 我们需要制定一个学习计划。

sentences.en: Do you have a plan for the weekend?
sentences.zh: 你周末有计划吗？

sentences.en: We hope to visit the zoo tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们希望明天去参观动物园。

sentences.en: Her hope is to become a doctor.
sentences.zh: 她的愿望是成为一名医生。

sentences.en: I need to find out the answer to this question.
sentences.zh: 我需要弄清楚这个问题的答案。

sentences.en: Can you help me find out where the library is?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我弄清楚图书馆在哪里吗？

sentences.en: We had a discussion about the project yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天讨论了这个项目。

sentences.en: Participating in discussion helps improve communication skills.
sentences.zh: 参与讨论有助于提高沟通能力。

sentences.en: What will happen at the party tomorrow?
sentences.zh: 明天的派对上会发生什么？

sentences.en: Accidents can happen when people are careless.
sentences.zh: 人们粗心时可能会发生意外。

sentences.en: I expect to finish my homework on time.
sentences.zh: 我期望按时完成作业。

sentences.en: We expect the weather to be sunny tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们期望明天天气晴朗。

sentences.en: He told a funny joke that made everyone laugh.
sentences.zh: 他讲了一个有趣的笑话，逗得大家都笑了。

sentences.en: Do you know a good joke to share with us?
sentences.zh: 你知道一个好笑话可以和我们分享吗？

sentences.en: We watched a funny comedy last night.
sentences.zh: 我们昨晚看了一部有趣的喜剧片。

sentences.en: She loves comedy because it always makes her laugh.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢喜剧，因为它总是让她发笑。

zh: 毫无意义的；意思不明确的

sentences.en: The word 'meaningless' describes something with no purpose or significance.
sentences.zh: 单词‘meaningless’描述没有目的或意义的事物。

sentences.en: If a sentence is meaningless, it doesn't convey any clear idea.
sentences.zh: 如果一个句子是meaningless的，它就不能传达任何清晰的意思。

sentences.en: We need to take action to solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 我们需要采取行动来解决这个问题。

sentences.en: Her quick action saved the little girl.
sentences.zh: 她迅速的行动救了那个小女孩。

sentences.en: I like watching action movies because they are exciting.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢看动作片，因为它们很刺激。

sentences.en: He often goes to the cinema to see action movies with his friends.
sentences.zh: 他经常和朋友们去电影院看动作片。

sentences.en: I like watching cartoon.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢看卡通片。

sentences.en: This cartoon is very interesting.
sentences.zh: 这部卡通片很有趣。

sentences.en: Culture includes art, music, and traditions of a group.
sentences.zh: 文化包括一个群体的艺术、音乐和传统。

sentences.en: We learn about different cultures to understand others better.
sentences.zh: 我们了解不同的文化是为了更好地理解他人。

sentences.en: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark in Paris.
sentences.zh: 埃菲尔铁塔是巴黎著名的地标。

sentences.en: She is famous for her beautiful singing voice.
sentences.zh: 她以美妙的歌喉而闻名。

sentences.en: She seems to appear out of nowhere.
sentences.zh: 她好像凭空出现了。

sentences.en: The stars appear bright in the dark sky.
sentences.zh: 星星在黑暗的天空中显得很明亮。

sentences.en: I want to become a teacher when I grow up.
sentences.zh: 我长大后想成为一名老师。

sentences.en: Water can become ice when it is cold enough.
sentences.zh: 当足够冷的时候，水会变成冰。

sentences.en: A rich man often donates money to charity.
sentences.zh: 富人经常向慈善机构捐款。

sentences.en: She wants to get rich by working hard.
sentences.zh: 她想通过努力工作致富。

sentences.en: The team worked hard and had a successful project.
sentences.zh: 这个团队努力工作，完成了一个成功的项目。

sentences.en: She felt successful after passing all her exams.
sentences.zh: 通过所有考试后，她感到很成功。

phrases.zh: 可能已经（表示对过去事情的推测）

sentences.en: It might rain tomorrow, so take an umbrella.
sentences.zh: 明天可能会下雨，所以带上雨伞。

sentences.en: She might go to the park if the weather is nice.
sentences.zh: 如果天气好的话，她可能会去公园。

sentences.en: The main idea of the story is clear.
sentences.zh: 这个故事的主要思想很清晰。

sentences.en: She is the main character in this novel.
sentences.zh: 她是这部小说的主要人物。

sentences.en: I need to find a reason for being late.
sentences.zh: 我需要为迟到找一个理由。

sentences.en: The main reason for his success is hard work.
sentences.zh: 他成功的主要原因是努力工作。

sentences.en: It is common for students to study hard.
sentences.zh: 学生努力学习是常见的。

sentences.en: English is a common language in the world.
sentences.zh: 英语是世界上一种常见的语言。

sentences.en: I like to watch a film on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在周末看电影。

sentences.en: This film tells an interesting story.
sentences.zh: 这部电影讲述了一个有趣的故事。

sentences.en: She was unlucky to miss the bus this morning.
sentences.zh: 她今天早上倒霉地错过了公交车。

sentences.en: It's unlucky to break a mirror, according to some people.
sentences.zh: 有些人认为打破镜子是不吉利的。

sentences.en: I don't want to lose my keys.
sentences.zh: 我不想弄丢我的钥匙。

sentences.en: Did you lose your way in the park?
sentences.zh: 你在公园里迷路了吗？

sentences.en: He gave a gift to his girlfriend.
sentences.zh: 他送了一份礼物给他的女朋友。

sentences.en: My girlfriend likes reading books.
sentences.zh: 我的女朋友喜欢读书。

sentences.en: Are you ready for the exam?
sentences.zh: 你准备好考试了吗？

sentences.en: She is ready to start her journey.
sentences.zh: 她准备好开始她的旅程了。

zh: 准备好（做某事）；愿意（做某事）

sentences.en: Please be ready to answer the teacher's questions.
sentences.zh: 请准备好回答老师的问题。

sentences.en: We need to be ready to leave for the trip at 8 AM.
sentences.zh: 我们需要准备好在早上8点出发去旅行。

sentences.en: A character in a story can be a hero or a villain.
sentences.zh: 故事中的角色可以是英雄也可以是反派。

sentences.en: The main character of the novel is very brave.
sentences.zh: 这本小说的主角非常勇敢。

sentences.en: The English word 'simple' means easy to understand.
sentences.zh: 英语单词“simple”的意思是容易理解。

sentences.en: She likes simple games because they are not complicated.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢简单的游戏，因为它们不复杂。

sentences.en: Children love to dress up as superheroes on Halloween.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在万圣节装扮成超级英雄。

sentences.en: She needs to dress up formally for the wedding party.
sentences.zh: 她需要为婚礼派对正式着装打扮。

sentences.en: She had to take her sister's place at the meeting because her sister was sick.
sentences.zh: 因为姐姐生病了，她不得不在会议上代替姐姐。

sentences.en: Can you take my place for a while? I need to make a phone call.
sentences.zh: 你能暂时替我一下吗？我需要打个电话。

sentences.en: The army protects our country.
sentences.zh: 军队保护我们的国家。

sentences.en: He wants to join the army when he grows up.
sentences.zh: 他长大后想参军。

sentences.en: We need to do a good job on our homework.
sentences.zh: 我们需要把作业做好。

sentences.en: She always tries to do a good job in her studies.
sentences.zh: 她总是努力把学习做好。

sentences.en: Children grow up quickly.
sentences.zh: 孩子们长得很快。

sentences.en: She wants to grow up to be a doctor.
sentences.zh: 她想长大后成为一名医生。

zh: 计算机程序设计员；编程人员

sentences.en: A computer programmer writes code to create software.
sentences.zh: 计算机程序员编写代码来创建软件。

sentences.en: My brother wants to be a computer programmer when he grows up.
sentences.zh: 我哥哥长大后想成为一名计算机程序员。

sentences.en: My mom likes to cook delicious food.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈喜欢做美味的食物。

sentences.en: Can you cook noodles for dinner?
sentences.zh: 你能做面条当晚餐吗？

sentences.en: A doctor helps sick people get better.
sentences.zh: 医生帮助生病的人康复。

sentences.en: My mother wants to be a doctor when she grows up.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈长大后想成为一名医生。

sentences.en: An engineer designs machines and buildings.
sentences.zh: 工程师设计机器和建筑物。

sentences.en: My uncle works as an engineer in a factory.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔在一家工厂当工程师。

sentences.en: The violinist played a beautiful melody on the stage.
sentences.zh: 这位小提琴家在舞台上演奏了一首优美的旋律。

sentences.en: My sister dreams of becoming a famous violinist in the future.
sentences.zh: 我的姐姐梦想将来成为一名著名的小提琴家。

sentences.en: The driver is driving the car carefully.
sentences.zh: 司机正在小心地开车。

sentences.en: My uncle works as a driver in a company.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔在一家公司当司机。

sentences.en: The pilot flies the airplane.
sentences.zh: 飞行员驾驶飞机。

sentences.en: My uncle is a pilot.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔是一名飞行员。

sentences.en: The pianist played a beautiful song on the piano.
sentences.zh: 这位钢琴家在钢琴上弹奏了一首美妙的歌曲。

sentences.en: My dream is to become a great pianist in the future.
sentences.zh: 我的梦想是将来成为一名伟大的钢琴家。

sentences.en: A scientist studies the world to find new knowledge.
sentences.zh: 科学家研究世界以发现新知识。

sentences.en: My dream is to be a great scientist in the future.
sentences.zh: 我的梦想是将来成为一名伟大的科学家。

sentences.en: You need to be sure about the answer before submitting.
sentences.zh: 在提交之前，你需要确定答案。

sentences.en: She is sure about her decision to study abroad.
sentences.zh: 她对出国留学的决定很确定。

sentences.en: Please make sure you finish your homework on time.
sentences.zh: 请确保你按时完成作业。

sentences.en: Make sure the door is locked before you leave.
sentences.zh: 离开前确保门锁好了。

zh: 学院；大学；高等专科学校

sentences.en: I go to college every day.
sentences.zh: 我每天去大学。

sentences.en: She studies hard at college.
sentences.zh: 她在大学努力学习。

sentences.en: Education is important for everyone's future.
sentences.zh: 教育对每个人的未来都很重要。

sentences.en: We go to school to get education.
sentences.zh: 我们去上学是为了接受教育。

sentences.en: Doctors use medicine to help patients get better.
sentences.zh: 医生使用药物帮助病人康复。

sentences.en: You should take the medicine as the doctor told you.
sentences.zh: 你应该按照医生的嘱咐吃药。

sentences.en: I want to study at a good university.
sentences.zh: 我想在一所好大学学习。

sentences.en: She is a student at Beijing University.
sentences.zh: 她是北京大学的一名学生。

sentences.en: An article is a piece of writing on a particular subject.
sentences.zh: 文章是关于特定主题的一篇书面作品。

sentences.en: We read articles to learn information or enjoy stories.
sentences.zh: 我们阅读文章来获取信息或欣赏故事。

sentences.en: I need to send a letter to my friend.
sentences.zh: 我需要给我的朋友寄一封信。

sentences.en: Can you help me send this email?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我发送这封邮件吗？

sentences.en: The resolution of the screen is very high.
sentences.zh: 这个屏幕的分辨率非常高。

sentences.en: I made a New Year's resolution to read more books.
sentences.zh: 我制定了新年计划要多读书。

sentences.en: Our team won the game.
sentences.zh: 我们队赢得了比赛。

sentences.en: She is a new member of the team.
sentences.zh: 她是这个队的新成员。

sentences.en: He practices every day to make the soccer team.
sentences.zh: 他每天练习是为了加入足球队。

sentences.en: She hopes to make the soccer team this year.
sentences.zh: 她希望今年能加入足球队。

sentences.en: She likes reading foreign books.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢读外国书籍。

sentences.en: We need to learn foreign languages.
sentences.zh: 我们需要学习外语。

sentences.en: She is able to swim fast.
sentences.zh: 她能游得很快。

sentences.en: We are able to finish the work on time.
sentences.zh: 我们能按时完成这项工作。

sentences.en: She is able to speak three languages fluently.
sentences.zh: 她能够流利地说三种语言。

sentences.en: With practice, you will be able to solve this math problem easily.
sentences.zh: 通过练习，你将能够轻松解决这道数学题。

sentences.en: I promise to help you with your homework.
sentences.zh: 我承诺帮你做家庭作业。

sentences.en: He made a promise to visit his grandparents.
sentences.zh: 他承诺去看望他的祖父母。

sentences.en: The beginning of the story is very interesting.
sentences.zh: 故事的开头非常有趣。

sentences.en: We should make a good plan at the beginning.
sentences.zh: 我们应该在开始时制定一个好计划。

sentences.en: At the beginning of the class, the teacher greeted us.
sentences.zh: 在课程开始时，老师向我们打了招呼。

sentences.en: We usually set goals at the beginning of each year.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在每年年初设定目标。

sentences.en: I need to improve my English skills.
sentences.zh: 我需要提高我的英语技能。

sentences.en: Practice can help improve your writing.
sentences.zh: 练习可以帮助提高你的写作。

sentences.en: Please write down your name on the paper.
sentences.zh: 请在纸上写下你的名字。

sentences.en: I need to write down the important notes.
sentences.zh: 我需要写下重要的笔记。

sentences.en: Physical exercise is good for health.
sentences.zh: 体育锻炼对健康有益。

sentences.en: We have a physical education class every week.
sentences.zh: 我们每周都有一节体育课。

sentences.en: Children should learn to take care of themselves.
sentences.zh: 孩子们应该学会照顾自己。

sentences.en: They often talk to themselves when they are alone.
sentences.zh: 他们独处时经常自言自语。

sentences.en: Her job has to do with helping people solve problems.
sentences.zh: 她的工作与帮助人们解决问题有关。

sentences.en: This story has to do with friendship and courage.
sentences.zh: 这个故事与友谊和勇气有关。

sentences.en: Self-improvement means working hard to be a better person.
sentences.zh: 自我提升意味着努力成为一个更好的人。

sentences.en: Reading books is a good way for self-improvement.
sentences.zh: 读书是自我提升的好方法。

sentences.en: She decided to take up painting as a hobby.
sentences.zh: 她决定把绘画作为爱好开始学习。

sentences.en: I need to take up more exercise to stay healthy.
sentences.zh: 我需要开始做更多运动来保持健康。

sentences.en: My hobby is reading books.
sentences.zh: 我的爱好是读书。

sentences.en: She has a hobby of painting.
sentences.zh: 她有画画的爱好。

sentences.en: She likes to paint colorful pictures.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢画色彩鲜艳的图画。

sentences.en: We need a brush to paint the wall.
sentences.zh: 我们需要一把刷子来刷墙。

sentences.en: I read books weekly.
sentences.zh: 我每周读书。

sentences.en: We have a weekly test.
sentences.zh: 我们有每周一次的测试。

sentences.en: I need to finish my schoolwork tonight.
sentences.zh: 我今晚需要完成我的作业。

sentences.en: Doing schoolwork helps me learn new things.
sentences.zh: 做功课帮助我学习新东西。

zh: 表示疑问；怀疑；提问；质询

sentences.en: He asked a difficult question.
sentences.zh: 他问了一个很难的问题。

sentences.en: If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
sentences.zh: 如果你有任何问题，尽管问。

sentences.en: We often discuss problems in class.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在课堂上讨论问题。

sentences.en: Let's discuss the plan for the weekend.
sentences.zh: 让我们讨论一下周末的计划。

sentences.en: I own a small cat.
sentences.zh: 我拥有一只小猫。

sentences.en: She owns a new book.
sentences.zh: 她拥有一本新书。

sentences.en: This is my personal diary.
sentences.zh: 这是我的个人日记。

sentences.en: She keeps her personal photos in a box.
sentences.zh: 她把她的个人照片放在一个盒子里。

sentences.en: The relationship between a parent and a child is very special.
sentences.zh: 父母和孩子之间的关系非常特别。

sentences.en: We should try to build a good relationship with our classmates.
sentences.zh: 我们应该努力和同学们建立良好的关系。

sentences.en: I need to write a paper for my class.
sentences.zh: 我需要为我的课程写一篇论文。

sentences.en: The professor praised her research paper.
sentences.zh: 教授表扬了她的研究论文。

sentences.en: Air pollution can harm our health.
sentences.zh: 空气污染会损害我们的健康。

sentences.en: We should try to reduce pollution in daily life.
sentences.zh: 我们应该努力在日常生活中减少污染。

sentences.en: I need to make a prediction about the weather tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我需要对明天的天气做一个预测。

sentences.en: Her prediction about the game turned out to be correct.
sentences.zh: 她对比赛的预测结果是正确的。

sentences.en: We should study hard for the future.
sentences.zh: 我们应该为了未来努力学习。

sentences.en: What will the future be like?
sentences.zh: 未来会是什么样子的？

sentences.en: Factories that release chemicals into rivers can pollute the water.
sentences.zh: 向河流排放化学物质的工厂会污染水源。

sentences.en: We should not litter to avoid polluting the environment.
sentences.zh: 我们不应该乱扔垃圾以避免污染环境。

sentences.en: We should protect the environment.
sentences.zh: 我们应该保护环境。

sentences.en: The environment is important for all living things.
sentences.zh: 环境对所有生物都很重要。

sentences.en: The Earth is a planet in our solar system.
sentences.zh: 地球是太阳系中的一颗行星。

sentences.en: Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system.
sentences.zh: 木星是太阳系中最大的行星。

sentences.en: The Earth is our home planet.
sentences.zh: 地球是我们的家园行星。

sentences.en: We live on the Earth.
sentences.zh: 我们生活在地球上。

sentences.en: We plant a tree in the garden.
sentences.zh: 我们在花园里种了一棵树。

sentences.en: The plant needs water and sunlight to grow.
sentences.zh: 这种植物需要水和阳光才能生长。

sentences.en: I read a part of the book.
sentences.zh: 我读了这本书的一部分。

sentences.en: This is an important part of the plan.
sentences.zh: 这是计划中重要的一部分。

sentences.en: Everyone should play a part in protecting the environment.
sentences.zh: 每个人都应该在保护环境中发挥作用。

sentences.en: She was happy to play a part in the school play.
sentences.zh: 她很高兴能在学校戏剧中扮演一个角色。

sentences.en: We should work for peace.
sentences.zh: 我们应该为和平而努力。

sentences.en: Peace is important for everyone.
sentences.zh: 和平对每个人都很重要。

sentences.en: The sea is blue and vast.
sentences.zh: 大海又蓝又广阔。

sentences.en: We can swim in the sea in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天我们可以在海里游泳。

sentences.en: We will build a new house next year.
sentences.zh: 我们明年将建一座新房子。

sentences.en: Workers build roads to connect cities.
sentences.zh: 工人们修建道路来连接城市。

sentences.en: The sky is blue and clear today.
sentences.zh: 今天天空蔚蓝又晴朗。

sentences.en: Birds are flying high in the sky.
sentences.zh: 鸟儿在天空中高飞。

sentences.en: An astronaut travels to space in a spaceship.
sentences.zh: 宇航员乘坐宇宙飞船前往太空。

sentences.en: The astronaut wears a special suit to stay safe in space.
sentences.zh: 宇航员穿着特殊的宇航服以在太空中保持安全。

sentences.en: She lives in a small apartment downtown.
sentences.zh: 她住在市中心的一间小公寓里。

sentences.en: We are looking for an apartment with two bedrooms.
sentences.zh: 我们正在找一套有两间卧室的公寓。

sentences.en: A rocket can fly high into the sky.
sentences.zh: 火箭能飞向高空。

sentences.en: We watched the rocket launch into space.
sentences.zh: 我们观看了火箭发射升空。

sentences.en: The sun and stars are in space.
sentences.zh: 太阳和星星都在太空中。

sentences.en: We can see many planets in space.
sentences.zh: 我们能在太空中看到很多行星。

sentences.en: A space station is a large structure where astronauts live and work in space.
sentences.zh: 空间站是宇航员在太空中生活和工作的大型建筑。

sentences.en: Astronauts conduct scientific experiments on the space station.
sentences.zh: 宇航员在空间站上进行科学实验。

sentences.en: A human is a person.
sentences.zh: 人类是一个人。

sentences.en: We are all humans.
sentences.zh: 我们都是人类。

sentences.en: The servant helps clean the house every day.
sentences.zh: 这个仆人每天帮忙打扫房子。

sentences.en: In the old story, the king had a loyal servant.
sentences.zh: 在这个古老的故事里，国王有一个忠诚的仆人。

sentences.en: The dangerous dog barked loudly.
sentences.zh: 这只危险的狗大声吠叫。

sentences.en: Swimming in deep water alone is dangerous.
sentences.zh: 独自在深水中游泳是危险的。

sentences.en: She has already finished her homework.
sentences.zh: 她已经完成了她的作业。

sentences.en: They have already arrived at the station.
sentences.zh: 他们已经到达车站了。

sentences.en: A factory makes many products every day.
sentences.zh: 一家工厂每天生产很多产品。

sentences.en: Workers go to the factory to work in the morning.
sentences.zh: 工人们早上前往工厂上班。

sentences.en: She practices the piano over and over again to improve.
sentences.zh: 她一遍又一遍地练习钢琴以提高水平。

sentences.en: He read the story over and over again until he remembered it.
sentences.zh: 他把这个故事读了一遍又一遍，直到记住为止。

sentences.en: I believe that I can succeed.
sentences.zh: 我相信我能成功。

sentences.en: She believes in the power of kindness.
sentences.zh: 她相信善良的力量。

zh: 不同意；持不同意见；有分歧

sentences.en: I disagree with your opinion.
sentences.zh: 我不同意你的观点。

sentences.en: They disagree on the best way to solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 他们在解决问题的最佳方法上存在分歧。

sentences.en: The even numbers are 2, 4, 6, 8 and so on.
She split the cake into two even parts.
sentences.zh: 她把蛋糕分成了两个相等的部分。

sentences.en: I agree with your idea.
sentences.zh: 我同意你的想法。

sentences.en: She nodded to agree.
sentences.zh: 她点头表示同意。

sentences.en: There are hundreds of books in the library.
sentences.zh: 图书馆里有数百本书。

sentences.en: Hundreds of people attended the concert last night.
sentences.zh: 昨晚有数百人参加了音乐会。

sentences.en: The ball has a round shape.
sentences.zh: 这个球有圆形的形状。

sentences.en: We can draw different shapes with a pencil.
sentences.zh: 我们可以用铅笔画出不同的形状。

zh: 倒塌；跌倒；掉落；（美式）秋天

sentences.en: Leaves fall from the trees in autumn.
sentences.zh: 秋天树叶从树上落下。

sentences.en: The temperature starts to fall as winter comes.
sentences.zh: 冬天来临时，气温开始下降。

sentences.en: The child might fall down if he runs too fast.
sentences.zh: 如果那个孩子跑得太快，他可能会摔倒。

sentences.en: Be careful not to fall down on the wet floor.
sentences.zh: 小心不要在湿地板上摔倒。

sentences.en: The cat is inside the box.
sentences.zh: 猫在盒子里面。

sentences.en: We play games inside the house when it rains.
sentences.zh: 下雨时我们在房子里面玩游戏。

sentences.en: I need to look for my lost pen.
sentences.zh: 我需要寻找我丢失的钢笔。

sentences.en: Can you help me look for the key?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我寻找钥匙吗？

zh: 可能存在或发生的；可能的

sentences.en: It is possible to finish the homework on time.
sentences.zh: 按时完成作业是有可能的。

sentences.en: Learning a new language is possible with practice.
sentences.zh: 通过练习学习一门新语言是有可能的。

zh: 不可能存在或发生的；不可能的

sentences.en: It is impossible to fly without wings.
sentences.zh: 没有翅膀飞翔是不可能的。

sentences.en: Finishing the project in one day seems impossible.
sentences.zh: 一天内完成这个项目似乎是不可能的。

sentences.en: The cat is on the left side of the table.
sentences.zh: 猫在桌子的左边。

sentences.en: Please write your name on the right side of the paper.
sentences.zh: 请把你的名字写在纸的右边。

sentences.en: She will probably come to the party tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 她明天很可能会来参加派对。

sentences.en: It will probably rain this afternoon, so take an umbrella.
sentences.zh: 今天下午可能会下雨，所以带把伞吧。

sentences.en: I read a book during the afternoon.
sentences.zh: 我在下午期间读了一本书。

sentences.en: She listened to music during her walk.
sentences.zh: 她在散步期间听音乐。

sentences.en: We often have a holiday on National Day.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在国庆节放假。

sentences.en: She plans to travel during the summer holiday.
sentences.zh: 她计划在暑假期间去旅行。

sentences.en: I can read a word in the book.
sentences.zh: 我能在书中读到一个单词。

sentences.en: Please write a new word on the paper.
sentences.zh: 请在纸上写一个新单词。

sentences.en: Can you shake hands with me?
sentences.zh: 你能和我握手吗？

sentences.en: The tree branches shake in the wind.
sentences.zh: 树枝在风中摇晃。

sentences.en: I love to drink a chocolate milk shake in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天我喜欢喝巧克力奶昔。

sentences.en: Can you make a strawberry milk shake for me?
sentences.zh: 你能为我做一杯草莓奶昔吗？

sentences.en: I use a blender to make fruit smoothies.
sentences.zh: 我用搅拌机做水果冰沙。

sentences.en: The blender can mix ingredients quickly.
sentences.zh: 搅拌机可以快速混合食材。

zh: 接通（电流、煤气、水等）；打开

sentences.en: Please turn on the light.
sentences.zh: 请打开灯。

sentences.en: Can you turn on the computer?
sentences.zh: 你能打开电脑吗？

sentences.en: Can you help me peel this apple?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我削这个苹果吗？

sentences.en: She likes to peel potatoes before cooking.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在烹饪前削土豆皮。

sentences.en: Please pour the milk into the glass.
sentences.zh: 请把牛奶倒进杯子里。

sentences.en: She likes to pour honey on her toast.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在吐司上倒蜂蜜。

sentences.en: I eat yogurt for breakfast.
sentences.zh: 我早餐吃酸奶。

sentences.en: Yogurt is a kind of healthy food.
sentences.zh: 酸奶是一种健康的食物。

sentences.en: Honey is sweet and made by bees.
sentences.zh: 蜂蜜很甜，是蜜蜂酿造的。

sentences.en: I put honey in my tea for extra flavor.
sentences.zh: 我在茶里加蜂蜜来增加风味。

sentences.en: A watermelon is a large, sweet fruit with green skin and red flesh.
sentences.zh: 西瓜是一种大而甜的水果，有着绿色的外皮和红色的果肉。

sentences.en: I like to eat watermelon in summer because it is very refreshing.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在夏天吃西瓜，因为它非常清爽。

sentences.en: I use a spoon to eat soup.
sentences.zh: 我用勺子喝汤。

sentences.en: The spoon is made of silver.
sentences.zh: 这把勺子是银做的。

sentences.en: She cooks soup in a pot.
sentences.zh: 她用锅煮汤。

sentences.en: The pot is on the stove.
sentences.zh: 锅在炉子上。

sentences.en: I want to add some sugar to my coffee.
sentences.zh: 我想给我的咖啡加一些糖。

sentences.en: Please add your name to the list.
sentences.zh: 请把你的名字添加到名单上。

sentences.en: Finally, we finished our homework.
sentences.zh: 最后，我们完成了作业。

sentences.en: She finally arrived at the airport.
sentences.zh: 她终于到达了机场。

sentences.en: Salt is used to make food taste better.
sentences.zh: 盐被用来让食物味道更好。

sentences.en: We need to add some salt to the soup.
sentences.zh: 我们需要往汤里加一些盐。

sentences.en: Sugar makes the cake sweet.
sentences.zh: 糖使蛋糕变甜。

sentences.en: I need to buy some sugar from the store.
sentences.zh: 我需要从商店买一些糖。

sentences.en: Cheese is a dairy product made from milk.
sentences.zh: 奶酪是一种由牛奶制成的乳制品。

sentences.en: I like to eat cheese on my sandwich.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在三明治上放奶酪吃。

sentences.en: I like to eat popcorn at the movies.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在电影院吃爆米花。

sentences.en: Popcorn is made from corn kernels.
sentences.zh: 爆米花是由玉米粒制成的。

sentences.en: Corn is a yellow vegetable that grows on tall stalks.
sentences.zh: 玉米是一种长在高茎上的黄色蔬菜。

sentences.en: We can eat corn boiled, roasted, or popped into popcorn.
sentences.zh: 我们可以煮玉米、烤玉米，或者把它爆成爆米花。

sentences.en: A machine can help us work faster.
sentences.zh: 机器能帮助我们更快地工作。

sentences.en: My father uses a machine to fix cars.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸用机器修理汽车。

sentences.en: We need to dig a hole for the tree.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为这棵树挖一个坑。

sentences.en: The dog likes to dig in the garden.
sentences.zh: 这只狗喜欢在花园里挖洞。

sentences.en: There is a hole in the wall.
sentences.zh: 墙上有一个洞。

sentences.en: The rabbit jumped into the hole.
sentences.zh: 兔子跳进了洞里。

sentences.en: I ate a ham sandwich for lunch.
sentences.zh: 我午餐吃了一个火腿三明治。

sentences.en: She made a sandwich with bread and cheese.
sentences.zh: 她用面包和奶酪做了一个三明治。

sentences.en: I spread butter on my toast for breakfast.
sentences.zh: 我早餐在吐司上涂黄油。

sentences.en: Butter is made from milk and used in cooking.
sentences.zh: 黄油由牛奶制成，用于烹饪。

sentences.en: I ate roast turkey for dinner.
sentences.zh: 我晚餐吃了烤火鸡。

sentences.en: Turkey is a country in Asia and Europe.
sentences.zh: 土耳其是一个横跨欧亚的国家。

sentences.en: Lettuce is a green vegetable often used in salads.
sentences.zh: 生菜是一种常用于沙拉的绿色蔬菜。

sentences.en: I like to add lettuce to my sandwich for extra crunch.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在三明治里加生菜增加脆感。

sentences.en: She ate a piece of cake.
sentences.zh: 她吃了一块蛋糕。

sentences.en: This is a piece of paper.
sentences.zh: 这是一张纸。

sentences.en: Thanksgiving is a holiday when families gather to give thanks.
sentences.zh: 感恩节是家人团聚表达感谢的节日。

sentences.en: People often eat turkey on Thanksgiving in many countries.
sentences.zh: 在许多国家，人们常在感恩节吃火鸡。

sentences.en: Traditional Chinese characters are often used in Taiwan and Hong Kong.
sentences.zh: 繁体中文通常在中国台湾和香港使用。

sentences.en: Learning traditional characters helps understand ancient Chinese culture.
sentences.zh: 学习繁体字有助于理解中国古代文化。

sentences.en: Autumn is the season when leaves turn yellow and fall.
sentences.zh: 秋天是树叶变黄掉落的季节。

sentences.en: We often go hiking in autumn because the weather is cool.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在秋天去远足，因为天气很凉爽。

sentences.en: We celebrate birthdays with cake and candles.
sentences.zh: 我们用蛋糕和蜡烛庆祝生日。

sentences.en: People celebrate festivals with family and friends.
sentences.zh: 人们和家人朋友一起庆祝节日。

sentences.en: I need to prepare for the exam tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我需要为明天的考试做准备。

sentences.en: She will prepare a delicious dinner for us.
sentences.zh: 她将为我们准备一顿美味的晚餐。

sentences.en: My mom pours gravy over the mashed potatoes.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈把肉汁浇在土豆泥上。

sentences.en: We often have turkey with gravy on Thanksgiving.
sentences.zh: 我们在感恩节经常吃火鸡配肉汁。

sentences.en: Mashed potatoes are soft and easy to eat.
sentences.zh: 土豆泥柔软且易于食用。

sentences.en: She mashed the bananas to make a smoothie.
sentences.zh: 她把香蕉捣成泥来做冰沙。

sentences.en: A pumpkin is a large, round vegetable with orange skin.
sentences.zh: 南瓜是一种大而圆的蔬菜，有着橙色的外皮。

sentences.en: We often carve pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns on Halloween.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在万圣节把南瓜雕刻成南瓜灯。

sentences.en: I like to eat apple pie.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢吃苹果派。

sentences.en: She baked a delicious pie for dessert.
sentences.zh: 她烤了一个美味的派当甜点。

sentences.en: You can mix red and blue to make purple.
sentences.zh: 你可以把红色和蓝色混合制成紫色。

sentences.en: She likes to mix milk with coffee.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢把牛奶和咖啡混合在一起。

sentences.en: Pepper is a spice that makes food hot.
sentences.zh: 胡椒是一种使食物变辣的香料。

sentences.en: She added some pepper to the soup.
sentences.zh: 她往汤里加了一些胡椒。

sentences.en: Please fill in the blank with the correct word.
sentences.zh: 请用正确的单词填空。

sentences.en: She needs to fill the bottle with water.
sentences.zh: 她需要把瓶子装满水。

sentences.en: I bake cookies in the oven.
sentences.zh: 我在烤箱里烤饼干。

sentences.en: The oven is hot when it's working.
sentences.zh: 烤箱工作时很烫。

sentences.en: I need to read the license plate number.
sentences.zh: 我需要读取车牌号。

sentences.en: The plate on the table is blue.
sentences.zh: 桌子上的盘子是蓝色的。

sentences.en: The book has a red cover.
sentences.zh: 这本书有一个红色的封面。

sentences.en: She closed the cover of her notebook.
sentences.zh: 她合上了笔记本的封面。

sentences.en: We serve customers with a smile every day.
sentences.zh: 我们每天微笑服务顾客。

sentences.en: The restaurant will serve dinner from 6 pm.
sentences.zh: 这家餐厅将从下午6点开始供应晚餐。

sentences.en: The temperature today is 25 degrees Celsius.
sentences.zh: 今天的温度是25摄氏度。

sentences.en: We use a thermometer to measure temperature.
sentences.zh: 我们用温度计测量温度。

sentences.en: We need to prepare for the exam.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为考试做准备。

sentences.en: She will prepare for her trip tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 她将为明天的旅行做准备。

sentences.en: I need to study hard for the exam.
sentences.zh: 我需要为考试努力学习。

sentences.en: The exam will be held next Monday.
sentences.zh: 考试将在下周一举行。

sentences.en: If you feel sick, you should go to the doctor.
sentences.zh: 如果你感觉不舒服，你应该去看医生。

sentences.en: My mom told me to go to the doctor when I have a fever.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈告诉我发烧时要去看医生。

sentences.en: I caught the flu and had to stay in bed.
sentences.zh: 我得了流感，不得不卧床休息。

sentences.en: Washing hands often can help prevent the flu.
sentences.zh: 经常洗手有助于预防流感。

sentences.en: The tickets for the concert are available now.
sentences.zh: 音乐会的票现在可以购买了。

sentences.en: Is this seat available?
sentences.zh: 这个座位是空着的吗？

sentences.en: We can try again another time.
sentences.zh: 我们可以下次再试。

sentences.en: She promised to visit me another time.
sentences.zh: 她答应下次再来看我。

sentences.en: We will wait until the rain stops.
sentences.zh: 我们会等到雨停。

sentences.en: She studied until midnight last night.
sentences.zh: 她昨晚学习到午夜。

sentences.en: Hang your coat on the hook.
sentences.zh: 把你的外套挂在钩子上。

sentences.en: We hang decorations for the party.
sentences.zh: 我们为派对挂装饰品。

sentences.en: I often hang out with my friends on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我经常在周末和朋友们出去玩。

sentences.en: Do you want to hang out at the park this afternoon?
sentences.zh: 今天下午你想去公园玩吗？

sentences.en: Can you catch the ball?
sentences.zh: 你能接住球吗？

sentences.en: I like to catch fish in the river.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在河里抓鱼。

sentences.en: My friend will invite me to the party.
sentences.zh: 我的朋友会邀请我去派对。

sentences.en: She wants to invite her teacher to dinner.
sentences.zh: 她想邀请她的老师吃晚饭。

sentences.en: I accept your invitation.
sentences.zh: 我接受你的邀请。

sentences.en: She will accept the gift happily.
sentences.zh: 她会开心地接受这份礼物。

sentences.en: She had to refuse the invitation because she was busy.
sentences.zh: 她因为忙不得不拒绝邀请。

sentences.en: It's polite to refuse politely when you can't accept.
sentences.zh: 当你不能接受时，礼貌地拒绝是有礼貌的。

sentences.en: I went to the park the day before yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我前天去了公园。

sentences.en: She finished her homework the day before yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她前天完成了作业。

sentences.en: We are going to the park the day after tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们后天要去公园。

sentences.en: She will finish her homework the day after tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 她后天会完成她的作业。

zh: 工作日（星期一至星期五的任何一天）

sentences.en: What weekday is today?
sentences.zh: 今天是星期几？

sentences.en: Monday is the first weekday of the week.
sentences.zh: 星期一是一周的第一个工作日。

sentences.en: Please help me look after my cat while I'm away.
sentences.zh: 我不在的时候请帮我照顾我的猫。

sentences.en: She stays at home to look after her sick grandmother.
sentences.zh: 她待在家里照顾生病的奶奶。

sentences.en: I received an invitation to the party.
sentences.zh: 我收到了一份派对的邀请函。

sentences.en: She sent me an invitation yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天给我发了一封邀请函。

sentences.en: Could you please turn down the music? It's too loud.
sentences.zh: 你能把音乐调小一点吗？太吵了。

sentences.en: She asked him to turn down the TV so she could study.
sentences.zh: 她让他把电视声音调小，这样她就能学习了。

sentences.en: She gave a quick reply to the email.
sentences.zh: 她迅速回复了邮件。

sentences.en: I am waiting for your reply.
sentences.zh: 我在等你的回复。

sentences.en: Please move forward to the next page.
sentences.zh: 请翻到下一页。

sentences.en: The car is moving forward slowly.
sentences.zh: 汽车正在缓慢向前行驶。

sentences.en: Please delete the wrong word.
sentences.zh: 请删除错误的单词。

sentences.en: I need to delete this file.
sentences.zh: 我需要删除这个文件。

sentences.en: I can print a document.
sentences.zh: 我可以打印一份文件。

sentences.en: Please print this picture.
sentences.zh: 请打印这张图片。

sentences.en: She felt sad because she lost her toy.
sentences.zh: 她因为丢了玩具而感到难过。

sentences.en: The sad movie made many people cry.
sentences.zh: 这部悲伤的电影让很多人哭了。

sentences.en: We say goodbye when leaving someone.
sentences.zh: 当我们离开某人时说再见。

sentences.en: She waved and said goodbye to her friends.
sentences.zh: 她挥手向她的朋友们说再见。

sentences.en: I want to take a trip to the mountains this summer.
sentences.zh: 今年夏天我想去山里旅行。

sentences.en: She plans to take a trip with her family during the holiday.
sentences.zh: 她计划假期和家人一起去旅行。

sentences.en: I am glad to see you.
sentences.zh: 见到你我很高兴。

sentences.en: She feels glad about the good news.
sentences.zh: 她对这个好消息感到高兴。

sentences.en: Can you help out with my homework?
sentences.zh: 你能帮我辅导一下作业吗？

sentences.en: She always helps out her friends when they need it.
sentences.zh: 当朋友们需要时，她总是会伸出援手。

sentences.en: Good preparation helps pass exams easily.
sentences.zh: 充分的准备有助于轻松通过考试。

sentences.en: We need to make preparation before the trip.
sentences.zh: 我们需要在旅行前做好准备。

sentences.en: I need glue to stick the paper.
sentences.zh: 我需要胶水来粘纸。

sentences.en: The glue is in the blue bottle.
sentences.zh: 胶水在蓝色的瓶子里。

sentences.en: I can't go without my phone.
sentences.zh: 没有手机我就不能去。

sentences.en: She finished the work without help.
sentences.zh: 她没有帮助就完成了工作。

sentences.en: She looked surprised when she heard the news.
sentences.zh: 听到这个消息时，她看起来很惊讶。

sentences.en: I was surprised to find the door unlocked.
sentences.zh: 发现门没锁，我感到很惊讶。

sentences.en: I look forward to seeing you tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我期待明天见到你。

sentences.en: We look forward to the summer vacation.
sentences.zh: 我们期待暑假的到来。

sentences.en: I hope to hear from you soon.
sentences.zh: 我希望很快收到你的来信。

sentences.en: She was happy to hear from her old friend.
sentences.zh: 收到老朋友的来信，她很高兴。

sentences.en: We had a housewarming party after moving into our new apartment.
sentences.zh: 搬进新公寓后，我们举办了一场乔迁派对。

sentences.en: She brought a nice gift to their housewarming celebration.
sentences.zh: 她带了一份精美的礼物去参加他们的乔迁庆祝活动。

sentences.en: The opening of the door made a loud noise.
sentences.zh: 门的开启发出了很大的声音。

sentences.en: We arrived just in time for the opening ceremony.
sentences.zh: 我们刚好及时赶上了开幕式。

sentences.en: We are going to the concert tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们明天要去听音乐会。

sentences.en: She bought a ticket for the concert.
sentences.zh: 她买了一张音乐会的票。

sentences.en: The headmaster is talking to the students in the hall.
sentences.zh: 校长正在大厅里和学生们谈话。

sentences.en: Our school's headmaster is very kind to everyone.
sentences.zh: 我们学校的校长对每个人都很和蔼。

zh: 大事；公开活动；比赛项目

sentences.en: An event is something that happens, like a birthday party.
sentences.zh: 事件是发生的某件事，比如生日派对。

sentences.en: We can talk about past events, such as last year's school trip.
sentences.zh: 我们可以谈论过去的事件，例如去年的学校旅行。

sentences.en: The guest arrived at the hotel yesterday.
sentences.zh: 这位客人昨天到达了酒店。

sentences.en: We need to prepare a gift for the guest.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为客人准备一份礼物。

sentences.en: I use a calendar to remember important dates.
sentences.zh: 我用日历来记住重要的日期。

sentences.en: The calendar on the wall shows today is Tuesday.
sentences.zh: 墙上的日历显示今天是星期二。

sentences.en: Daytime is when the sun is shining brightly.
sentences.zh: 白天是太阳明亮照耀的时候。

sentences.en: We usually go to school during the daytime.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在白天去上学。

sentences.en: We have a meeting every Monday.
sentences.zh: 我们每周一开会。

sentences.en: She is preparing for the meeting now.
sentences.zh: 她现在正在为会议做准备。

sentences.en: I watched a funny video yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天看了一个有趣的视频。

sentences.en: She likes to share her daily life through video.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢通过视频分享她的日常生活。

sentences.en: We need to organize our books on the shelf.
sentences.zh: 我们需要把书架上的书整理好。

sentences.en: She will organize a party for her friends.
sentences.zh: 她将为朋友们组织一场派对。

sentences.en: I like to eat potato chips as a snack.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢把薯片当作零食吃。

sentences.en: Potato chips are usually crispy and salty.
sentences.zh: 薯片通常是酥脆且咸的。

sentences.en: I like eating chocolate.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢吃巧克力。

sentences.en: Chocolate is a sweet food.
sentences.zh: 巧克力是一种甜食。

sentences.en: She was upset because she missed the bus.
sentences.zh: 她因为错过了公交车而感到沮丧。

sentences.en: The bad news made him very upset.
sentences.zh: 这个坏消息让他非常难过。

sentences.en: I take a taxi to school every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上乘出租车去上学。

sentences.en: The taxi driver knows the city very well.
sentences.zh: 这位出租车司机非常了解这座城市。

sentences.en: Teachers often give students good advice.
sentences.zh: 老师们经常给学生好的建议。

sentences.en: It's important to listen to your parents' advice.
sentences.zh: 听取父母的建议很重要。

sentences.en: I love to travel to different countries.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢去不同的国家旅行。

sentences.en: Travel can help us learn about new cultures.
sentences.zh: 旅行可以帮助我们了解新的文化。

sentences.en: An agent helps people with tasks.
sentences.zh: 代理人帮助人们处理事务。

sentences.en: My mom is a travel agent.
sentences.zh: 我的妈妈是一名旅行代理人。

sentences.en: An expert is someone who has special knowledge or skills in a particular field.
sentences.zh: 专家是在特定领域拥有专门知识或技能的人。

sentences.en: We can ask the expert for advice on how to solve this problem.
sentences.zh: 我们可以向专家请教如何解决这个问题。

sentences.en: She tends to keep to herself and rarely joins group activities.
sentences.zh: 她往往喜欢独处，很少参加集体活动。

sentences.en: After the argument, he kept to himself for the rest of the day.
sentences.zh: 争吵之后，他一整天都自己待着。

sentences.en: A teenager is usually between 13 and 19 years old.
sentences.zh: 青少年通常在13到19岁之间。

sentences.en: The teenager enjoys playing basketball with friends after school.
sentences.zh: 这个青少年喜欢放学后和朋友们打篮球。

sentences.en: It's normal to feel nervous before a test.
sentences.zh: 考试前感到紧张是正常的。

sentences.en: Her temperature is normal, so she doesn't have a fever.
sentences.zh: 她的体温正常，所以她没有发烧。

sentences.en: You can't go out unless you finish your homework.
sentences.zh: 除非你完成作业，否则不能出去。

sentences.en: I will call you unless there is an emergency.
sentences.zh: 除非有紧急情况，否则我会给你打电话。

sentences.en: Certainly, I will help you with your homework.
sentences.zh: 当然，我会帮你做家庭作业。

sentences.en: She certainly knows the answer to that question.
sentences.zh: 她当然知道那个问题的答案。

sentences.en: I keep my money in a wallet.
sentences.zh: 我把钱放在钱包里。

sentences.en: She bought a new wallet yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天买了一个新钱包。

sentences.en: A mile is a unit of distance equal to 1.609 kilometers.
sentences.zh: 一英里是等于1.609公里的距离单位。

sentences.en: She walks a mile every morning to keep fit.
sentences.zh: 她每天早上走一英里来保持健康。

sentences.en: She gets angry when someone breaks her things.
sentences.zh: 当有人弄坏她的东西时，她会生气。

sentences.en: His angry words made everyone quiet.
sentences.zh: 他愤怒的话语让所有人都安静了下来。

sentences.en: Understanding the problem is the first step to solving it.
sentences.zh: 理解问题是解决它的第一步。

sentences.en: Good understanding helps in learning new things quickly.
sentences.zh: 良好的理解有助于快速学习新事物。

sentences.en: Being careless can lead to mistakes.
sentences.zh: 粗心会导致错误。

sentences.en: She made a careless error in her homework.
sentences.zh: 她在作业中犯了一个粗心的错误。

sentences.en: Everyone makes a mistake sometimes.
sentences.zh: 每个人有时都会犯错。

sentences.en: I need to correct my mistake.
sentences.zh: 我需要改正我的错误。

sentences.en: He hurt himself while playing football.
sentences.zh: 他踢足球时伤到了自己。

sentences.en: He often talks to himself when he is alone.
sentences.zh: 他独自一人时经常自言自语。

zh: 小心的；细致的；精心的；慎重的

sentences.en: Be careful when crossing the street.
sentences.zh: 过马路时要小心。

sentences.en: She is always careful with her things.
sentences.zh: 她对自己的东西总是很小心。

sentences.en: My teacher will advise me on my homework.
sentences.zh: 我的老师会就我的作业给我建议。

sentences.en: Can you advise me on how to study English well?
sentences.zh: 你能就如何学好英语给我建议吗？

sentences.en: I need to solve this math problem.
sentences.zh: 我需要解决这道数学题。

sentences.en: She can help you solve the puzzle.
sentences.zh: 她可以帮你解开这个谜题。

sentences.en: Take one step at a time.
sentences.zh: 一步一步来。

sentences.en: He walked up the steps.
sentences.zh: 他走上了台阶。

sentences.en: Trust is the foundation of a good friendship.
sentences.zh: 信任是良好友谊的基础。

sentences.en: We should trust our parents and teachers.
sentences.zh: 我们应该信任我们的父母和老师。

sentences.en: She has rich experience in teaching English.
sentences.zh: 她在英语教学方面有丰富的经验。

sentences.en: Traveling can give us valuable life experience.
sentences.zh: 旅行能给我们宝贵的人生经验。

sentences.en: Please cut the apple in half.
sentences.zh: 请把苹果切成两半。

sentences.en: She folded the paper in half.
sentences.zh: 她把纸对折了一下。

zh: 在中途；部分地做（或达到）

sentences.en: We stopped halfway to rest.
sentences.zh: 我们在中途停下来休息。

sentences.en: She lives halfway between the school and the park.
sentences.zh: 她住在学校和公园中间的位置。

sentences.en: I like apples, and I also like bananas, else I might get bored.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢苹果，也喜欢香蕉，否则我可能会觉得无聊。

sentences.en: Finish your homework now, else you will be late for class.
sentences.zh: 现在完成你的作业，否则你上课会迟到。
